title: The penalty will be recovered from the date of commencement of unauthorized use till the day non-Fin Tech activities
clause_text: The penalty will be recovered from the date of commencement of unauthorized use till the day non-Fin Tech activities.
section: 33(13)(A) Buildings of Smart Fin Tech Centre
